data.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: The Farstriders
data.detailed_description:
Clad in gleaming sigmarite and armed with heaven-forged weaponry, the grizzled hunters of the Stormcast Eternals are the sworn enemies of Chaos. Unlock this warband and play as The Farstriders in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

THE WARBAND

  • Led by Sanson Farstrider himself, this warband is comprised of three fighters.
  • The Farstriders inspire when finishing an action phase in enemy territory - strategic positioning is key.
  • When inspired, Farstrider is able to bring his Star Falcon companion into the fray, with critical hits dealing even more damage!

TIPS & TRICKS

  • Equipped with Boltstorm Pistols, as well as melee weapons, The Farstriders excel at fighting from afar and in close combat!
  • Upgrades that increase mobility and spike your damage allow for strategic positioning and precise ranged hits than can take out even the beefiest of enemies!
  • Knowing how and when to charge into the enemy’s territory to inspire your fighters is one of the most crucial decisions you’ll have to make - consider it carefully!

data.short_description: Clad in gleaming sigmarite and armed with heaven-forged weaponry, the grizzled hunters of the Stormcast Eternals are the sworn enemies of Chaos. Unlock this warband and play as The Farstriders in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
